pages.text:
Town Council
The Bronson town council meetings are held on the first and third Monday of every month at 6:00 p.m. in the Dogan S. Cobb Municipal Building, 660 E. Hathaway Ave, Bronson FL. If the first Monday in any given month is a commonly recognized holiday, then the meeting shall be held on the following Tuesday of that month at 6:00 p.m.
To be a speaker at one of the Town of Bronson Town Councils please complete a Speaker Request Form and return it to the Town Hall no later than 4:30 p.m. the Thursday prior to the next scheduled meeting.
Bruce Greenlee, Mayor
Phone: (352) 486-2354
Email:
brucegreenlee@gmail.com
Virginia Phillips, Vice-Mayor
Phone: (352) 486-2354
Email:
virginiaphillips@townofbronson.org

Phone: (352) 486-2354

Franklin Schuler, Town Councilor
Term Ends April of 2027

Town of Bronson, Florida
650 Oak Street | PO Box 266
Bronson, FL 32621
Mon-Fri: 8:00-4:30
Phone: 352-486-2354
Fax: 352-486-6262
In the event of an after-hours emergency (such as a water main break), please contact the Levy County Sheriff Office at 352.486.5111.

Emergency Management
The Emergency Management Department for the Town of Bronson falls under the direction of Levy County Emergency Management. This page will be used to post Emergency Orders and other important information.
Levy County Emergency Orders
Levy County Emergency Management can provide you with:
Information on natural and technological hazards that may affect you, your family or your business
Advice on how to protect yourself, your family, or your business
Technical assistance in the development of emergency plans for public agencies and the private sector
Advice on how to exercise your emergency plan
Schedule a guest speaker at your group/organization meeting
Setup a tour of the Levy County EOC
Information on supporting your community in an emergency or disaster
Please give us a call at (352) 486-5213 (M-F, 8-4:30) and we will be glad to answer any questions you might have!
John MacDonald, Director
johnmacdonald
@levydisaster.com
Leatha Keene, Planner
leathakeene@levydisaster.com
